settings.modal.term-of-use.text:
TERMS OF USE

Carefully read the following terms of use before using this Web site. By using this Web site, you signify your consent to the terms of use of this agreement (Agreement). This Web site is owned and operated by MREX and may be used by you only for personal and non-commercial purposes. You are not authorized to change, adapt, rearrange, reformulate, or decrypt the content of this site, in any way whatsoever.

Unless otherwise specified, the materials on this site are presented solely for the purpose of promoting MREX products and services.

MREX makes no representation that materials, products, or services depicted on this site are appropriate or available in all locations.

The materials contained on or accessible through this Web site (including, without limitation, all digital images, products, and services offered by MREX) shall not be used, redistributed, broadcast, published, copied to any other media, or reproduced for any purpose other than for personal, educational, and non-commercial purposes without the prior written consent of MREX. These materials must not be altered, distorted, or used in any way that is detrimental to MREX’s image or reputation. The copyright in these materials is owned by MREX or is used by MREX with the permission of the owner. MREX does not represent or warrant that such materials do not infringe the rights of others. Nothing contained herein shall be construed as granting, explicitly or implicitly, any license or other right to use these materials other than in accordance with the terms contained herein.

LIABILITY

This Web site and all the information it contains are provided “as is” without warranty of any kind, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement. In no event, regarding this Web site or any other hyperlinked Web sites, will MREX be liable to any party for any damages or injuries caused by (including, but not limited to) any failure of performance, error, omission, direct, indirect, special, or other consequential damages, including, without limitations, any lost profits, business interruptions, loss of programs, or other data on your information handling system or otherwise, even if we are expressly advised of the possibility of such damages.

Information on this Web site could include technical inaccuracies or typographical errors. Changes may be made periodically to the information on this Web site and to the products and services it represents. MREX does not warrant that this Web site will be available and accessible at all times. It is up to you to take precautions to protect yourself from items such as viruses and other items of a destructive nature.

TRADEMARKS

You must obtain written consent from MREX before using any MREX trademarks.

Other trade names and trademarks present on the site appear with the permission of their respective owners, or appear under principles of “fair use” or “nominal use.” Unless otherwise noted, by using a third-party trademark or trade name on this site, we do not intend to suggest any affiliation with or endorsement of such a third party or its products or services, and we hereby expressly disclaim any such affiliation or endorsement.

LINKS TO THE MREX WEB SITE

In the event that you wish to link or republish a document posted on the MREX site on your Web site, you shall do so by posting a link to MREX’s Web site in accordance with the terms of this section. Unless otherwise set forth in a written agreement between you and MREX, you agree that such links shall be in accordance with the following:

  1. The appearance of the link must not damage or dilute the goodwill associated with MREX.
  2. The appearance, position, and other attributes of the link may not create the false appearance that your organization or entity is sponsored by, affiliated to, or associated with MREX unless you actually are and, in such an event, the appearance, position, and other attributes of the link must not confuse users as to your actual relationship with MREX.
  3. When selected by a user, the link must display the MREX Web site on its own and not within a frame on the linking Web site.
  4. MREX reserves the right to request removing or modifying the link at any time and at its sole discretion.

 

EXTERNAL LINKS

When you access non-MREX Web sites through the MREX Web site, understand that these Web sites are independent from MREX, that MREX has no control over the content of these Web sites, and that MREX gives no warranty regarding such Web sites.

JURISDICTIONAL ISSUES

The present agreement is governed by and shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of Québec without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. The parties have designated the District of Québec, Province of Québec, as the jurisdiction for any litigation arising in connection herewith. If any provision of the present agreement is unlawful, void, or unenforceable for any reason, then that provision shall be deemed severable from the present agreement and shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any remaining provisions. The present agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties relating to the subject matter hereof and shall not be modified except in a writing signed by both parties.
settings.modal.privacy-policy.text:
PRIVACY POLICY

With the development of new communication tools, it is necessary to pay particular attention to the protection of privacy. That is why we are committed to respecting the confidentiality of the personal information we collect.

COLLECTION OF PERSONAL INFORMATION

We collect the following information:

  • Last Name
  • First Name
  • Mailing Address
  • Postal Code
  • E-mail address
  • Phone / Fax number
  • Age / Date of Birth
  • Education / Training
  • Profession
  • Income / Financial resources

The personal information we collect is gathered through forms and through the interactivity established between you and our website. We also use cookies and/or log files, as described in the following section, to gather information about you.

FORMS AND INTERACTIVITY:

Your personal information is collected through forms, namely:

Website registration form

  • Order form
  • Opinion Survey
  • Contest

We use the information collected for the following purposes:

  • Information / Promotional offers
  • Statistics
  • Contact
  • Website management (presentation, organization)

Your information is also collected through the interactivity that can be established between you and our website in the following ways:

  • Statistics
  • Contact
  • Web site management (presentation, organization)

We use the information collected for the following purposes

  • Correspondence
  • Information or promotional offers

LOG FILES AND COOKIES

We collect certain information through log files and cookies. This information is mainly the following:

  • IP address
  • Operating system
  • Pages visited and requests
  • Time and day of connection

The use of such files allows us to:

  • Improvement of the service and personalized welcome
  • Personalized consumption profile
  • Order follow-up
  • Statistics

SHARING OF PERSONAL INFORMATION

We are committed to not commercializing the personal information we collect. However, we may share this information with third parties for the following reasons:

  • Consumer profile
  • Order fulfillment
  • Partnership
  • Advertising

If you do not wish to have your personal information shared with third parties, you may opt out at the time of collection or at any time thereafter, as mentioned in the following section.

RIGHT OF ACCESS

We undertake to recognize a right of access and rectification to the persons concerned who wish to persons who wish to consult, modify or even delete their personal information.

The exercise of this right will be done :
E-mail: info@mrex.co
Telephone: 1 877 350.8673

SECURITY

The personal information we collect is kept in a secure environment. The people working for us are required to respect the confidentiality of your information. To ensure the security of your personal information, we use the following measures

  • SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) protocol
  • Access management - authorized person
  • Access management - person concerned
  • User ID / Password

We are committed to maintaining a high level of confidentiality by incorporating the latest technological innovations to ensure the privacy of your transactions. However, since no mechanism offers maximum security, there is always a degree of risk when using the Internet to transmit personal information.

NOTRE PROMESSE

Our commitment to the protection of personal information meets the requirements of the following program:

  • https://letsencrypt.org/
